section.p: The dragon turns the attention of all three heads upon you, as if noticing you for the first time.
‘Wait,’ it rumbles, bathing you in a blast of warm, sulphurous air, ‘I sense that you are indeed blessed. Though not dead. Hmm. Odd. Still, I have my duty.’
The dragon shuffles aside, opening the way to the Stairs of the Land Below the World.
‘By the way, once you go through the arch, you cannot get back this way,’ adds the celestial dragon.

choices.choice: Go back down the way you came
